juegazo, parece que puede a llegar a ser muy monotono, pero os aseguro de que cada partida es un mundo

This game is the most un-optimized software known to man. The dev team is so lazy and has not fixed any bugs that have been present for years and that they have acknowledged. Every time my game updates (which already takes an hour for 15mb) the files are corrupt and it updates a second time, and ive seen multiple forum posts about users also having this problem. If you try and play with 4 friends (its 4 player co-op) online it will not let everyone join the game, half of them will crash consistently. We all showed them our support tickets and tried every troubleshoot they threw at us (which was literally just re-install the game, verify game files, update drivers, etc.) and the conclusion was "We will look into the issue". Its a fun game but you are literally unable to play it with your friends and it takes an hour for a 5mb update to install so please don't give them money.
this game is amazing! i love it so much! i play it with my friends, and i enjoy having fun matches that aren't against Bubba, Bing Bong, Micheal, or freddy!
esta muy bueno, pero si quieres divertirte, no subas de rango. o te tocara la escoria de internet en cada partida
Probably the worst matchmaking ever in the history of gaming

Game is great, once you get over the repetitive loop of how things go down. If you take every match as a new experience you'll definitely enjoy the game. If you look at it as oh, its just repairing generators/ killing survivors  I can see how some people would and do get bored pretty easily.
After some time in the game u gonna catch up with the plays. Coolest one.
Just get it. You'll love it and you'll hate it, but keep coming back either way :D

ich liebe dead by daylight habe am anfang 2018 auf der playstation gespielt und es mir direkr vor paar tagen gekauft wo ich meinem pc geholt habe meiner meinung nach einer der besten spiuelen habe auf nder playstation 5678 stunden gehabt

A great game to play solo or with friends, which caters to the good or evil side of the gamer. With new content that comes out almost every month, be it new original characters, new costumes, map/graphic updates or the addition of well-loved horror favourites, this game will keep you on your toes.

I enjoy this game whenever a bug isn't in my every match.

It is a very addicting game with many redeeming qualities that may distract you from the problems early on, but I have had a pretty good experience with this game.
I have put over 2,400 hours in this game on Xbox and 510 hours on here.

Overall it's an alright experience and i would recommend it to a friend but would warn them about problems.


7/10
